name: Máy thái thịt QX250
line1: QX250 Meat Slicer – professional meat processing machine for restaurants and butchers
line2: Compact stainless-steel build, high precision cutting, suitable for sliced meat production.

name: Máy thái thịt QX260
line1: QX260 Fresh Meat Slicer – ideal for fresh meat slicing in restaurants and kitchens
line2: 1500W motor, adjustable blades 2–20mm, capacity up to 250kg/h, stainless steel design.

name: Meat Slicer DQ90
line1: Electric Meat Slicer DQ90 – Replaceable blades, 850W power
line2: Cut thickness: 2–2.5–3–3.5–5–7–10mm. Capacity: 70–100kg/h. Compact 30×32.9×35cm stainless steel body, 20kg weight, 220V. Ideal for slicing beef, pork, BBQ meat, hotpot ingredients, and salads.

name: Meat Slicer RS-85P
line1: Fresh Meat Slicer RS-85P – Replaceable blade system, 850W motor
line2: Cut thickness: 2–2.5–3.5–5–7–10mm. Capacity 70–100kg/h, 310r/min. Stainless steel structure 35.5×30×39cm, 22kg. Flexible blade replacement for different slice thicknesses.

name: Meat Slicer HD95
line1: HD95 Fresh Meat Slicer – Heavy-duty 850W motor, adjustable blades
line2: Cut thickness: 2–2.5–3.5–5–7–10mm. Capacity: up to 200kg/h. 40×34×43cm stainless steel body, 30kg. Replaceable cutting blades, suitable for hotpot, BBQ, salad prep.

name: Meat Slicer ES-250N
line1: Frozen Meat Slicer ES-250N – Shunling brand, 320W motor
line2: Blade diameter 250mm, cut thickness 1–10mm adjustable. Productivity: ~21kg/day. Aluminum alloy body, 21kg weight, 220V/50Hz, 510×460×460mm. Ideal for slicing frozen meats and cold cuts.

name: Meat Slicer ES-300
line1: Frozen Meat & Cooked Meat Slicer ES-300 – 420W power, 30cm blade
line2: Cut range: 1–15mm adjustable, productivity: 30–40kg/day. Size: 51×46×46cm, weight: 24.5kg. Aluminum alloy body, for slicing frozen meat, ham, and sausage.

name: Meat Slicer ES-300N
line1: Frozen Meat Slicer ES-300N – Aluminum body, 420W motor
line2: 30cm blade, adjustable 1–15mm thickness. Productivity: 30kg/day. Size: 51×46×46cm, 25kg weight. Ideal for frozen meat, ham, and deli slicing.

name: Automatic Meat Slicer SL300E
line1: Semi-Automatic Frozen Meat Slicer SL300E – 550W cutting motor + 300W tray motor
line2: 30cm blade (12inch), adjustable 1–15mm. Productivity: 50–70kg/day. Size 60×54×68cm, weight 47kg. Automatic feed belt, ideal for restaurant use.

name: Automatic Meat Slicer SL300B
line1: Automatic Frozen Meat Slicer SL300B – 550W cutting motor, 300W feed motor
line2: 30cm blade, adjustable 1–11mm. Productivity: up to 150kg/day. Size 60×60×75cm, 62kg. Fully automatic dual-motor design, aluminum alloy frame for heavy-duty use.

name: Fresh Meat Slicer QX260
line1: QX260 Fresh Meat Slicer – 1500W motor, ideal for restaurants and processing shops
line2: Blade sizes 2–20mm adjustable, 250kg/h capacity. Stainless steel body, 220V/50Hz, 44kg, 58×38×50cm. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Industrial Fresh Meat Slicer DQ8
line1: DQ8 Meat Slicer – 2200W motor, replaceable blade system (2–20mm)
line2: 150kg/h capacity, stainless steel body, 220V/50Hz, 51kg, size 35.5×42×82cm. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Industrial Meat Slicer DQ9
line1: DQ9 High-Performance Meat Slicer – 2200W motor, interchangeable blade set 2–20mm
line2: 250kg/h capacity, stainless steel, 220V/50Hz, 51kg, dimensions 35.5×42×82cm. Warranty: 12 months.

name: Fresh Meat Slicer DQ300
line1: DQ300 Fresh Meat Slicer – 3000W power, dual-blade support (optional)
line2: 400kg/h capacity, blade options 2–10mm, stainless steel frame, 200V/50Hz, 61kg, 51×42×82cm. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Automatic Frozen Meat Slicer SL350B
line1: SL350B Fully Automatic Frozen Meat Slicer – 750W cutting power, Ø353mm blade
line2: 0–18mm adjustable slice thickness, 800kg/day capacity, aluminum alloy body, 225kg, 100×75×145cm. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Fresh Meat Shredding Machine QS5
line1: QS5 Dual-Blade Fresh Meat Shredder – 2×2200W motors, 450kg/h productivity
line2: Adjustable 2.5–15mm blades, stainless steel, 220V/50Hz, 95kg, size 57×50×89cm. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Large Industrial Meat Slicer DQ500
line1: DQ500 Heavy-Duty Meat Slicer – 5000W motor, 800kg/h output
line2: Blade range 3.5–30mm, stainless steel body, 220V, 140kg, 80×58×88cm. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Automatic Meat Cutting Machine QS500
line1: QS500 Automatic Meat Cutter – Dual 3000W motors, 700kg/h output
line2: Interchangeable blades 2–20mm, stainless steel, 220V/50Hz, 130kg, 72×55×95cm. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Commercial Meat Slicer DQ125
line1: DQ125 Large Meat Slicer – 2200W motor, 250kg/h output, adjustable blades 2–10mm
line2: Stainless steel structure, 220V, 70kg, 48×40×80cm. Suitable for restaurants and food factories. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Chicken Meat Cutter TH-1200
line1: TH1200 Chicken Cutter – 1.5kW motor (optional 3.5kW), 600–750kg/h capacity
line2: Stainless steel frame, 1300×800×900mm, 230kg, 220V or 380V. Cutting width 10–60mm, B1100 belt drive. Warranty: 15 months.

name: Frozen Meat Cutter SK-4
line1: SK4 Frozen Meat Slicer – 3kW power, 260–300kg/h cutting capacity
line2: Adjustable 0–15mm slice thickness, stainless steel, 1200×800×1200mm, 300kg, 220V or 380V. Warranty: 12 months.

name: Frozen Meat Slicer SK-2 (Dual Door)
line1: SK2 Dual-Door Frozen Meat Slicer – 2.5kW motor, 100–150kg/h capacity
line2: Adjustable thickness 0–12mm, 1450×430×1200mm, 200kg, 220V. Origin: China. Warranty: 12 months.

name: Blade Sharpener for Meat Slicers
line1: Specialized blade sharpener for slicers such as QX260, HD95, RS85P, DQ8, DQ9, DQ300,…
line2: Keeps blades sharp and durable for clean slicing results. Compact and easy to use.

name: Cleaning Kit for Meat Slicer Blades
line1: Cleaning set includes: 1 clamp bar + 2 belts, 2 combs (different sizes), 1 cleaning brush
line2: Suitable for RS85P, HD95, DQ8, DQ9, DQ300 and similar slicer models.

name: Replacement Blade for QX260
line1: Spare blade for QX260 slicer – sizes 2–20mm, sharp and durable edge
line2: Easy to clean with high-pressure washing. Stainless steel construction for long-term use.

name: Replacement Blade for RS85P
line1: Compatible with RS85P slicer – sizes 2–10mm, premium steel bearings
line2: Sharp, even cutting blades. Ideal replacement part for RS85P slicer.

name: QX250 Fresh Meat Blade Set
line1: Blade set for QX250 slicer – sizes from 2mm to 15mm, interchangeable design
line2: Easily detachable, suitable for various meat thickness levels. Distributor: T&H Company.

name: Frozen Meat and Cooked Meat Blades
line1: Replacement blades for slicers: 250E, 300ES, SL300E, SL300B, SL350B
line2: Includes ES250, ES300, SL300B, SL300E models. High-precision stainless steel cutting edge.

name: Meat Slicer Repair Service
line1: Repair service for slicers (Cooked & Frozen): SL350B, SL300B, SL300E, ES300, ES250
line2: Also supports fresh meat slicers: DQ1, DQ7, DQ8, QX250, HD850, HD850 (2C). Quality and affordable maintenance.
